hotel_name: The Westin Las Vegas Hotel & Spa
review_text: Bad: The coffee for the in room coffee maker was awful....couldn't drink it. Sooooo bitter and strong !. Good: The bed was extra comfy. View from the room great (overlooked the High Roller) and the room was very clean and housekeeping great.
review_title: Great. Good location....not on the strip but very close. Pity the renovations were underway.
